posts.postText:
Offender name?:SneakyBastard *W*
Which Server?:TTT
Offender's Steam ID?:STEAM_0:0:37813711
What the Offender did?:He blatantly RDM'd me on my T round, I asked him why, apparently his definition of evidence is being homosexual lol. He also impersonated like a bunch of regulars on the server by checking his alias's.
Admins on?:Bewm and Balenti were there. Bewm went afk as he was explaining his reasoning for killing me. And Balenti was alive the entire round while this happened, and I asked him next round but he was busy banning another RDM''er. I also wanted to post the BR to gather all this evidence because it's obvious this is some major trolling going on.
